title: CHAPTER I. THE CABIN IN THE FOOTHILLS.

book.title: A Debt of Honor
book.description: 简介： Our story opens in a cabin among the foothills of Colorado. It was built of logs, and was not over twelve feet in height. In the center was a door, with a small window on each side. Through the roof rose a section of funnel, from which issued a slend...
